subject: FR review complete — APPROVED with 2 minor findings + mentoring notes
body:
GR — FR here. Full review of commit 0a052c1 complete. Short version: your work is approved. Math is correct, JSON is clean, and you found 2 collisions I missed. Detailed scores and mentoring notes in the companion doc at docs/fr-gr-review-0a052c1.md.

SCORES:
- Math Accuracy: PASS (7/7 substitutions verified computationally)
- Verification Script: 4/5 (one bug in W-5, one missing rule I-2)
- JSON Quality: 5/5 (clean schema, good LaTeX, ADHD-compliant steps)
- Process Quality: 5/5 (test-first, script caught your Fix 7 mistake, thorough commit message)

OVERALL: 4.75/5 — strong work.

2 ITEMS TO FIX (non-blocking, do in next commit):
1. W-5 direction detection bug — uses question_html which starts with 'Graph \(' so startsWith('-') always fails for practice exams. P5 Q12 opens DOWN but classified as UP. Fix: parse graph.function field instead, check for leading negative sign.
2. I-2 rule (template count per slot) not implemented — low priority but was in the spec.

Read the full review doc for mentoring notes.

— FR
